brian h do

Digital and Branding Design

Designing humanistic brands whose ideals withstand trends. My designs start from drafts, and continue through development and guidelines for future use. Focused on maximal storytelling through minimal aesthetics.

Philosophy.

I think the best – businesses, people, ideas – are led by goals and virtues, not by empty showmanship. Good design should help in the same way: to clarify a message, rather than to distort or parade it. Even when there is more excitement, design must instill an underlying thoughtfulness to leave a serious impression. I work with brands whose values are best stated clearly and honestly. Simplicity not for its own sake, but for the sake of comfortably and honestly sharing missions and values.
